Content: Chairman of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party Youth Front, ShanthaBandara says the second leg of the reforms initiative of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party has been initiated under the guidance of President Maithripala Sirisena. Addressing a media briefing held in Colombo ShanthaBandara pointed out that the Youth Front of the SLFP will commence a national program titled ‘ Visanduma’. He highlighted that a career guidance program will be implemented in August under the directives of President Maithripala Sirisena to address a range of issues of the youth. It will be the best package that has been prepared for the betterment of the youth of the country.
